item.title: Communication between Python and R
item.description: Python and R languages can communicate with each other within RStudio. By using the package “reticulate”, Rstudio is now able to understand and call from code written in a python chunk in subsequent python AND R chunks. library(reticulate);library(stringr) In python, I have created the following sentence as a string. It is saved as a string in the local environment. sentence = "I'm a Texas Ex baby!!!!" sentence ## "I'm a Texas Ex baby!
